items.sentence: This has been one of the driest years we've ever had.
Tom moved to Australia a little over three years ago.
I want to know how long Tom plans to be in Australia.
I've finally gotten used to living here in Australia.
I've been living in Australia for almost three years.
Many children play in the vacant lot behind my house.
Tom was surprised that Mary didn't understand French.
I suspect Tom and Mary are going to be there tonight.
Tom actually thought that Mary would go out with him.
I thought you told me that you couldn't speak French.
At that time, Tom lived in a small town in Australia.
Mathematics is not just the memorization of formulas.
Do you have any idea what the population of Tokyo is?
The population of Tokyo is larger than that of Osaka.
I met some Canadians in the park yesterday afternoon.
You can either stay here by yourself or come with us.
Tom hasn't been to Australia as many times as I have.
I'm dieting, so I'll have just a smidgen of that pie.
If you do something that crazy, you'll be laughed at.
The train left the station and was soon out of sight.
